biotools.summary: BRS-nonint (Balanced Random Sampling of Non-interactions) is a method of sampling non-interactions randomly from the complement graph of protein-protein interactions, while the degree of each protein in the ‘positive’ dataset (interactions) equals to that in the ‘negative’ dataset (non-interactions).

bioschemas.name: BRS-nonint
bioschemas.summary: BRS-nonint (Balanced Random Sampling of Non-interactions) is a method of sampling non-interactions randomly from the complement graph of protein-protein interactions, while the degree of each protein in the ‘positive’ dataset (interactions) equals to that in the ‘negative’ dataset (non-interactions).
